Instruction: 'Slice the bagel in half and toast until golden brown.'
Cook the egg in a skillet over medium heat to your desired doneness, seasoning with salt and pepper.'
'Warm the ham slices in the skillet or microwave.'
'Place the cooked egg on one half of the bagel.'
'Place sliced Swiss cheese on top of the ham.'
'Cover with the other half of the bagel.'
Serve immediately and enjoy your hearty ham, egg, and Swiss bagel!'
